text: Hey all - looking for a way to send an email to a team member when their tasks are overdue by x days

So far I've tried making a contact based workflow that runs daily and checks if there is any task associated to the contact that is
• not completed
• not updated in the past 14 days
• owner is known
which then attempts to notify owner and a slack channel for overdue tasks
seems pretty weak however because I can't trigger based on task status itself, and I can't pull any task information, (including task name), which is frustrating.
has anyone done this before (in a better way)? This is the product of at least 3 minutes of thought and hard work :sweat_smile::joy:
